content.header: Name that tune is a game based on a populat TV show.
content.description: The participants compete againt each other by guessing the title of a song as fast as possible.

login.title: Login
login.content: use this button to login to your Spotify account.

content.header: Game configuration allows you to configure your game by selecting playlists and editing song properties.

clue.2: - defines what clue will be presented to players.

points.4: Note: When song is playing the value increases by 10 every 1 second.

youtube.2: - add youtube link to song. Allows to display the video in game client.
youtube.3: (Created with the idea of playing Just Dance videos but will play anything).

loadplaylist.title: Load game from playlist:
loadplaylist.step1: Search playlists and select the one you want to play.

step2.2: Add clues, points and youtube links to songs.
step2.3: (Note: If clue is not defined song author name will be use as one).

loadfile.title: Load game from file:
loadfile.step1: Click settings button to open settings modal.
loadfile.step2: Click upload button to upload a previous game configuration from file.

step3.2: Add clues, points and youtube links to songs.
step3.3: (Note: If clue is not defined song author name will be use as one).

savefile.title: Save game to file:
savefile.step1: Search playlists and select the one you want to play.

step2.2: Add clues, points and youtube links to songs.
step2.3: (Note: If clue is not defined song author name will be use as one).

savefile.step3: Click settings button to open settings modal.
savefile.step4: Click download button to download current game configuration file.

content.header: Master panel is a cockpit for game master to lead the game.

set.name: Previous Set, Next Set
set.description: - buttons to change the array of currently displayed songs.
set.note: (Note: Songs from playlist are divided into sets of 5 songs).

name.name: Team name
name.description: - name of the team, click to change.

points.name: Team points
points.description: - team points, click to add the current point pool to the team.

increment.description: - change team points in increment of 10.

video.description: - open/close youtube video in game window.
video.note: (Note: Disabled if no Youtube link was provided).

enable.description: - enable/disable the song (for example if no team guessed the song name).

gamewindow.name: Open new game window
gamewindow.description: - open game client for game participants.

content.1: Main game window for alle the players in teams to look at. Reflects data set in Game Configuration and Game Master.
content.2: Shows youtube video for a song when the proper button is clicked in the Master Panel.

modal.downloadmsg: - Download current game configuration with song, clues and points.
modal.uploadmsg: - Upload previous game configuration z pliku.
modal.resetpointsmsg: - Reset points to 100 for all songs.
modal.maxpointsmsg: - Max points value for a song (default 400).
modal.pointsincrementmsg: - The value by which points increase every second (default 5).
